name: Beef and Rice
author: sarah.kindermann
summary: Super fast, super easy, and super tasty! Serve with buttered bread.
ingredients: 1 (6.9 ounce) package chicken flavored rice mix (such as Rice A Roni®)
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease
Stir rice portion of packaged rice mix into beef; cook and stir until rice is lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Pour water into beef and rice, stir seasoning packet from rice into mixture, and cover skillet
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the liquid has been almost completely absorbed, about 30 minutes
